channel.title: Getting started on
channel.description: Recent content in Getting started on

item.title: Overview
item.description: Welcome to Sharkey’s documentation! Sharkey is a Misskey fork following upstream changes when possible, with added features. Like any other ActivityPub software Sharkey can interface with the thousands of servers that form the fediverse, an interconnected social network, working in tandem with software such as Akkoma, Mastodon, Pixelfed and many more. Have you heard of Sharkey, but you’re not sure how it differs from Misskey? Go to the comparison page.
